description: A FastAPI router module defining API endpoints for managing 'regions' in the e-commerce backend. It includes a route for listing all regions, leveraging SQLAlchemy for database interactions and Pydantic schemas for response serialization.

classes.name: Region
classes.description: SQLAlchemy model representing a geographic or administrative region.

classes.name: RegionRead
classes.description: Pydantic schema for serializing 'Region' data in API responses.

methods.name: List[RegionRead] list_regions(db: Session = Depends(db_session))
methods.description: API endpoint function that retrieves all regions from the database, sorted by name, and returns them serialized as 'RegionRead' objects.
